Description: Two joining fragments (with 1924,1201.22) of inner face of ring of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery kernos; white slip; simple guilloche pattern with dots in the interstices.
Curator's comments: The sherd joins British Museum 1924,1201.22. For parallels, see British Museum 1924,1201.23.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2183) (phase 2)
